titles.title: Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Paul B. Henry, a Representative from the State of Michigan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 8/2/1993--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Paul B. Henry from Michigan.
